metadata.title: American Motorcycle Trading Co - About Us Video 2020

sections: Learn more about our featured dealer!
Formed from humble beginnings in 1996, the

started in a 6,000 sq. ft. facility in Dallas. They expanded quickly over the years, moving in 2003 to a start of the art facility of 27,000 sq. ft., and now newly moved to a brand new location in Bedford, Texas of over 40,000 sq. ft. The team of motorcycle experts in ready to help you buy, sell, or service your motorcycle, and operates to the highest standards in the industry. The selection of certified motorcycles offered are the cleanest and best value for the dollar you’re going to find.
The American Motorcycle Trading Company Difference
While there are many areas of the dealer that are

, their emphasis on quality is their highest priority. For more than two decades, they have bought and sold a significant amount of motorcycles, and their expertise is how they know what to look for in a quality motorcycle. Many of the motorcycles in their inventory come from dealer trade-ins, as they have forged strong relationships with dealers around the nation.

All of the motorcycles in their inventory have gone through a rigorous inspection process, starting from the initial pre-buy inspection, and also a pre-delivery inspection. Technicians comb through each bike to ensure the safety and functionality of each motorcycle.

of used Harley-Davidson Motorcycles. They also feature brands like Indian, Kawasaki, and Honda, to name a few. They also offer
When you’re ready to sell your bike, American Motorcycle Trading Company makes receiving a cash offer simple. All you have to do is fill out a
, submit it, and you will receive a cash offer, good for five days.
